alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:27PM EDT until July 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PISCATAQUIS COUNTY... At 626 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monson, or near Guilford, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Guilford, Brownville Junction, Milo, Monson, Ebeemee, Elliottsville, Brownville, Abbot, Sebec, Willimantic, Bowerbank, Onawa, Barnard, Katahdin Iron Works and Williamsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
